title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: View Photographs
body: Photographs: Wangemann’s 1889-1890 European Recordings       Return to main page: Wangemann's 1889-1890 European recordings                   Portraits of Theo Wangemann   8 Photos  A compilation of the six photographs of Theo Wangemann known to survive.          Theo Wangemann archival documents   6 Photos  A selection of archival documents used by historians to research Theo Wangemann's work.          Theo Wangemann’s 1889-1890 European wax cylinders   39 Photos  Twelve wax cylinders recorded by Theo Wangemann in Europe during 1889-1890 (arranged here in catalog number order), and the original wooden box in which they were carried.            Theo Wangemann's phonograph   2 Photos  The Edison phonograph used by Theo Wangemann during his trip to Europe in 1889-90. This artifact is now owned by collector Stuart H. Miller, M.D.
